items.name: Backpack
items.description: A sturdy leather pack that can hold up to 4 Bulk of items. Items in a backpack are protected from damage.

items.name: Bandolier
items.description: A bandolier holds up to eight items of light Bulk within easy reach and is usually used for alchemical items or ammunition.

items.name: Bedroll
items.description: A rolled-up blanket with a tied leather cord that provides basic comfort and warmth for sleeping outdoors.

items.name: Belt Pouch
items.description: A simple leather pouch that attaches to a belt and can hold up to 4 items of light Bulk.

items.name: Candle
items.description: A simple wax candle that burns for 8 hours, shedding bright light in a 5-foot radius and dim light to 10 feet.

items.name: Chalk
items.description: A stick of chalk useful for marking surfaces, drawing diagrams, or leaving messages.

items.name: Compass
items.description: A magnetic compass that helps determine cardinal directions, granting a +1 item bonus to Survival checks to avoid becoming lost.

items.name: Crowbar
items.description: A heavy iron bar used for prying things open, granting a +1 item bonus to Athletics checks to Force Open.

items.name: Flint and Steel
items.description: Striking the flint and steel together creates sparks used to start fires, requiring 1 minute to light a torch or similar object.

items.name: Grappling Hook
items.description: A four-pronged metal hook attached to a rope, allowing you to anchor the rope to battlements, window ledges, or other edges.

items.name: Hammer
items.description: A simple one-handed hammer used for driving stakes, nails, and spikes.

items.name: Healer's Tools
items.description: A set of bandages, herbs, and surgical tools that grants a +1 item bonus to Medicine checks and is required to Treat Wounds.

items.name: Holly and Mistletoe
items.description: Sacred plants used as a primal spellcasting focus by druids and other primal spellcasters.

items.name: Hooded Lantern
items.description: A lantern that burns oil for 6 hours, shedding bright light in a 30-foot radius and dim light to 60 feet. The hood allows you to direct the light or close it completely.

items.name: Ink
items.description: A small vial of black ink suitable for writing with a quill or pen, containing enough ink for about 100 pages.

items.name: Inkpen
items.description: A quill or metal pen used for writing with ink on parchment or paper.

items.name: Journal
items.description: A blank book of bound parchment or paper, suitable for recording notes, sketches, or observations.

items.name: Ladder (10-foot)
items.description: A wooden ladder that can be positioned to climb up or down a 10-foot height.

items.name: Lantern Oil
items.description: A pint of oil that fuels a lantern for 6 hours or can be used as a thrown weapon to spread fire.

items.name: Lock (Simple)
items.description: A basic mechanical lock that can be opened with a key or picked with thieves' tools (DC 15).

items.name: Magnifying Glass
items.description: A handheld lens that grants a +1 item bonus to Perception checks to notice fine details of documents, fabric, and the like.

items.name: Manacles
items.description: Heavy metal restraints that bind a creature's wrists or ankles, requiring a successful DC 17 Athletics check to break or DC 17 Thievery check to pick.

items.name: Mirror
items.description: A small hand mirror useful for looking around corners or examining your appearance.

items.name: Piton
items.description: A metal spike that can be driven into a surface to provide an anchor point for ropes.

items.name: Potion of Minor Healing
items.description: A magical elixir that restores 1d8 Hit Points when consumed with an Interact action.

items.name: Rations
items.description: Preserved food suitable for long journeys, providing enough sustenance for one Medium creature for 1 day.

items.name: Religious Symbol (Wooden)
items.description: A wooden symbol of your deity or philosophy, used as a divine spellcasting focus.

items.name: Repair Kit
items.description: A portable kit containing tools and materials for fixing damaged equipment, granting a +1 item bonus to Crafting checks to Repair.

items.name: Rope (50 feet)
items.description: A hempen rope 50 feet long that can hold up to 3,000 pounds and requires a DC 17 Athletics check to Climb.

items.name: Sack
items.description: A large cloth bag that can hold up to 8 Bulk worth of items.

items.name: Sewing Needle
items.description: A simple needle and thread used for mending clothes and fabric.

items.name: Signal Whistle
items.description: A small metal whistle that produces a loud, piercing sound audible up to 500 feet away.

items.name: Soap
items.description: A bar of soap useful for bathing and washing clothes.

items.name: Spellbook (Blank)
items.description: A blank book with 100 pages for recording arcane spells, required by wizards and magi to prepare spells.

items.name: Tent (Pup Tent)
items.description: A small tent that shelters two Medium creatures from the elements.

items.name: Thieves' Tools
items.description: A set of lockpicks and other tools required to Pick Locks or Disable Devices using Thievery.

items.name: Torch
items.description: A wooden rod capped with twisted flax soaked in tallow that burns for 1 hour, shedding bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light to 40 feet.

items.name: Waterskin
items.description: A leather container that holds enough drinking water to sustain one Medium creature for 1 day.

items.name: Writing Set
items.description: A portable set containing ink, inkpen, parchment, and a small knife for trimming quills and scraping away mistakes.

items.name: Sheath
items.description: A leather or wooden case for storing a weapon, keeping it protected and easily accessible.

items.name: Alchemist's Fire (Lesser)
items.description: A flask of volatile alchemical reagents that explodes into flame on impact. When thrown as a Strike (with a range increment of 20 feet), it deals 1d8 fire damage plus 1 fire splash damage. On a hit, the target takes 1 persistent fire damage. Dealing even 1 point of splash damage to a creature breaks the flask on them, applying 1 persistent fire damage.

items.name: Acid Flask (Lesser)
items.description: A flask of concentrated acid that sears through flesh and corrodes metal. When thrown as a Strike (with a range increment of 20 feet), it deals 1d6 acid damage plus 1 acid splash damage. On a hit, the target takes 1 persistent acid damage, and can attempt a DC 15 Fortitude save to reduce the persistent damage by half.

items.name: Bottled Lightning (Lesser)
items.description: A carefully sealed vial of crackling electricity. When thrown as a Strike (with a range increment of 20 feet), it deals 1d6 electricity damage plus 1 electricity splash damage. On a hit, the target becomes flat-footed until the start of your next turn.

items.name: Thunderstone (Lesser)
items.description: A small stone that releases a thunderous boom upon striking a hard surface. When thrown as a Strike (with a range increment of 20 feet), it deals 1d4 sonic damage. On a hit, the target must succeed at a DC 17 Fortitude save or become deafened for 1 minute (or 1 hour on a critical failure).

items.name: Elixir of Life (Minor)
items.description: A potent healing elixir created through alchemical processes. Drinking this elixir takes an Interact action and restores 1d6+1 Hit Points. The elixir has a slightly bitter taste but works quickly to mend wounds and restore vitality.

items.name: Antidote (Lesser)
items.description: An elixir that bolsters the body's defenses against toxins. Drinking this elixir takes an Interact action and grants a +2 item bonus to Fortitude saves against poisons for 6 hours. If you are afflicted with a poison, you can also immediately attempt a saving throw against it at the normal DC (not a flat check).

items.name: Antiplague (Lesser)
items.description: An elixir that fortifies the body against disease. Drinking this elixir takes an Interact action and grants a +2 item bonus to Fortitude saves against diseases for 24 hours. If you are afflicted with a disease, you can also immediately attempt a saving throw against it at the normal DC (not a flat check).

items.name: Darkvision Elixir (Lesser)
items.description: An elixir that temporarily grants the ability to see in darkness. Drinking this elixir takes an Interact action and grants you darkvision for 10 minutes, allowing you to see in darkness and dim light just as well as in bright light. If you already have darkvision, the elixir has no effect.

items.name: Smokestick (Lesser)
items.description: A small tube that releases thick smoke when activated. You can Activate the smokestick using an Interact action to create a cloud of smoke in a 10-foot burst centered on one corner of your space. All creatures within the smoke become concealed, and all creatures outside the smoke become concealed to creatures within it. The smoke lasts for 1 minute or until dispersed by strong wind.

items.name: Sunrod
items.description: An alchemical rod that glows brightly when activated. You can Activate the sunrod using an Interact action, causing it to glow with bright light in a 20-foot radius (and dim light to the next 20 feet) for 6 hours. The light is warm and steady, making it ideal for extended exploration. Unlike torches, sunrods don't produce heat or flame.

items.name: Tanglefoot Bag (Lesser)
items.description: A sack filled with sticky adhesive compounds. When thrown as a Strike (with a range increment of 20 feet), it bursts on impact, covering the target in sticky goo. The target takes a -10-foot status penalty to its Speeds for 1 minute. The target can remove the goo by Escaping (DC 17) or spending 3 Interact actions to carefully remove it.

items.name: Tindertwig
items.description: An alchemically treated stick that ignites into flame with a simple strike against a rough surface. Using a tindertwig to light a torch (or anything else with tinder and fuel) takes an Interact action. Unlike flint and steel, which takes 1 minute, a tindertwig allows you to light something as part of a single action. Tindertwigs are waterproofed and will even ignite when wet.

items.name: Giant Centipede Venom
items.description: The extracted venom of a giant centipede, processed for alchemical use. This poison must be applied to a weapon and delivered via a Strike that deals piercing or slashing damage. The target must succeed at a DC 17 Fortitude save or take 1d6 poison damage immediately and 1d6 poison damage again after 1 round. On a critical failure, the target also becomes sickened 1.

items.name: Lethargy Poison (Lesser)
items.description: An insidious poison that saps the target's speed and reflexes. This poison must be applied to a weapon and delivered via a Strike that deals piercing or slashing damage. The target must succeed at a DC 18 Fortitude save or become slowed 1 for 1 minute. On a critical failure, the target is slowed 2 instead. The target can attempt a new save at the end of each of its turns to reduce the slowed condition by 1.

items.name: Black Adder Venom
items.description: A deadly toxin harvested from black adders that weakens the body. This poison must be applied to a weapon and delivered via a Strike that deals piercing or slashing damage. The target must succeed at a DC 18 Fortitude save or take 1d4 poison damage and become enfeebled 1 for 1 minute. On a critical failure, the target takes double damage and is enfeebled 2 instead.
